titleStmt.title: A discouery of the abhominable delusions of those, who call themselues the Family of loue Wherein their false Christ, and false profession is plainely laide open; and all their grosse cauils cleerely confuted.

A discouery of the abhominable delusions of those, who call themselues the Family of loue Wherein their false Christ, and false profession is plainely laide open; and all their grosse cauils cleerely confuted.

notesStmt.note: The imprint date is made with turned C's.
Preface signed: Written by those Christians who are falsly called Anabaptists.
Running title reads: A discouery of the Family of loue.
Signature to preface crossed out in ink.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
